<title level="1" right="Background " pfs="Standard">[Detective](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=11)</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 61 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

</column>

You solved crimes as a police inspector or took jobs for wealthy clients as a private investigator. You might have become an adventurer as part of your next big mystery, but likely it was due to the consequences or aftermath of a prior case.

Choose two ability boosts. One must be to Intelligence
or Wisdom, and one is a free ability boost.

You're trained in the [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14) skill, and the [Underworld Lore](/skills/lore) skill. You gain the [Streetwise](/Feats.aspx?ID=846) skill feat.
